title: Paint Scraper
summaries: The Paint Scraper is a tool which is used to remove paint off tiles and walls, eliminating the need of breaking and re-placing a tile to remove its paint. The Paint Scraper is purchased for 1 from the Painter. Its upgrade, the Spectre Paint Scraper, grants a bonus to range. Paint removed by a scraper can never be recovered.
In [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Paint Scraper can be used to remove moss from tiles.
The Paint Scraper cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have modifiers.

statistics.Tooltip:
Used to remove paint or coatings
Can sometimes collect moss
statistics.Buy: 1
statistics.Sell: 20
